name: worldfeel
description: How Is The World Feeling - A MERN app collecting daily emotions from around the world

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --workspace=packages/shared" "npm run dev --workspace=apps/web" "npm run dev --workspace=apps/server"
scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=packages/shared && npm run build --workspace=apps/server && npm run build --workspace=apps/web
